teacher_info.intro:
I’m Yulia. I’m a certified native Russian language teacher. I’m originally from Moscow and I’m now living in Spain for the last 10 years. I started teaching 7 years ago. At first there were face-to-face lessons. Subsequently, I began to teach online and the circle of my students expanded.

Me llamo Yulia. Soy profesora certificada nativa de ruso. Soy de origen Moscú y ahora vivo en España durante los últimos 10 años. Empecé a dar clases hace 7 años. Al principio eran clases presenciales. Posteriormente, comencé a dar clases online y el círculo de mis alumnos se amplió.
teacher_info.short_signature: Professional native Russian language teacher as a foreign language with 7 years of experience.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am qualified to teach students of all ages and levels. I also provide lessons of the business Russian language. I can explain the Russian grammar to elementary-level students in English and Spanish. 

Estoy capacitada para enseñar a estudiantes de todas las edades y niveles. También doy clases del idioma ruso de negocios. Puedo explicar la gramática rusa a los estudiantes con un nivel básico en inglés y español.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are balanced and include the explanation of the grammar rules, writing exercises to memorize them and speaking exercises to apply grammar and vocabulary in conversational practice.

Mis clases son equilibradas e incluyen la explicación de las reglas gramaticales, ejercicios para memorizarlas y ejercicios de conversación para aplicar la gramática y el vocabulario en la práctica conversacional.

-	Acquaintance

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: The course for beginners who are learning the Russian from scratch or have already know the Russian alphabet. It includes the phonetic course and the grammar course for the elementary level. Gender and plural of nouns, pronouns, Russian cases, verbal aspects and conjugation, conversation structures.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for intermediate level
pro_course_detail.description: The course includes the grammar and vocabulary for the intermediate level. Russian cases (nouns, adjectives, pronouns), the verbal aspects, tenses and conjugation, verbs of movement, conversation structures.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for upper-intermediate level
pro_course_detail.description: The course includes the grammar and vocabulary for the upper-untermediate level. The verbs of movements with prefixes, conditional mood, Russian gerund and participle, complex sentences, reflexive verbs, indefinite and negative adverbs.

pro_course_detail.title: Business Russian language
pro_course_detail.description: This course is designed for those who learn Russian for the business purposes. Besides the grammar of the certain level (it depends of the student´s level), it includes special vocabulary and conversation models, that are used in business circles.

teacher_info.intro:
Родился в России, живу в Турции. Нравится узнавать что-то новое о природе, животных, о том, как устроен наш организм. 

Люблю заниматься спортом, например, кататься на велосипеде. Так же хорошая музыка доставляет удовольствие. Время от времени изучаю программирование. Стараюсь постоянно улучшать навыки чтения и разговорной речи. Делаю это как на родном языке, так и на турецком.

Если вы хотите переехать в другой город или страну, расскажу что-то из своей практики. Могу найти общие темы для разговора как с детьми, так и с теми, кто уже на пенсии.

Стараюсь жить по такому принципу: "радоваться своим успехам, не сравнивая себя с другими". Уверен, что этот совет поможет и вам в изучении языка.
teacher_info.short_signature: 16% скидка на урок вне моего графика. Lesson outside my schedule. Görüşürüz, görüşərik, see you.
teacher_info.about_me:
Родился в России, живу в Турции. Нравится узнавать что-то новое о природе, животных, о том, как устроен наш организм. 

Люблю заниматься спортом, например, кататься на велосипеде. Так же хорошая музыка доставляет удовольствие. Время от времени изучаю программирование. Стараюсь постоянно улучшать навыки чтения и разговорной речи. Делаю это как на родном языке, так и на турецком.

Если вы хотите переехать в другой город или страну, расскажу что-то из своей практики. Могу найти общие темы для разговора как с детьми, так и с теми, кто уже на пенсии.

Стараюсь жить по такому принципу: "радоваться своим успехам, не сравнивая себя с другими". Уверен, что этот совет поможет и вам в изучении языка.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Кто-то сказал: "Хороший учитель - это хороший ученик".
Я учился на курсах азербайджанского языка. Давал уроки друзьям. Это интересно, когда можешь научить других чему-то новому, полезному.

Сейчас продолжаю изучать турецкий и немного английский. Чуть-чуть говорю по-узбекски. Поделюсь с вами методами, которые помогают мне в освоении языков.

Как маленькие дети учатся говорить? Они не сидят за учебниками. Многому их учат родители. Со временем они сами начинают что-то спрашивать. И, конечно, они не стесняются говорить, не боятся, что скажут что-то неправильно. Для меня важно создать атмосферу, в которой вы не будете стесняться задавать вопросы и не будете бояться ошибаться.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Возможно, когда-то вы хотели научиться плавать, кататься на велосипеде... Это казалось чудом. Но со временем, это стало реальностью. Всё благодаря усердию и тренировкам. Не хочу, чтобы такие "тренировки" были скучными. Система связанных образных ассоциаций помогает эффективнее запоминать слова, выражения и делает изучение языка интересным.

Даже если вы только начинаете учить русский, не переживайте. Есть жесты, мимика, рисунки. Всё это поможет в обучении. Уверен, вы меня тоже чему-то научите. Не стесняйтесь говорить какие методы изучения языка нравятся вам или чего вы ожидаете от меня.

Благодаря вашим стараниям владение новым языком уже не будет для вас чудом. Оно станет реальностью!

course_info.trial_description:
Предлагаю такой вот план урока.

Расскажите немного о себе, например, откуда вы. 
Поделитесь — для чего вы учите язык, где хотите его практиковать.
Будет интересно узнать несколько слов на вашем родном языке.

Затем, мы посмотрим насколько хорошо вы владейте русским. Если, хотите, выучим новое слово или фразу. Для этого будем использовать метод, описанный в моём вступительном видео.

Выслушаю ваши пожелания по поводу обучения. А именно — как вам больше нравится учить язык. Возможно, с помощью видео, песен, иллюстраций или письменных упражнений.

Подберём примерную программу изучения языка. Моя задача — сделать изучение языка практичным и интересным. До встречи на уроке!

pro_course_detail.title: Нескучный русский для детей и взрослых. Даже если вам уже за 60, не поздно начать изучение языка.
pro_course_detail.description:
Хотите выучить новый язык, но не хотите сидеть за учебниками? Хорошо, попробуем другой метод. Когда нам что-то нравится, мы готовы уйти в это с головой. Так что мотивация — это хороший двигатель, который приведёт вас к успеху. Поэтому, для меня очень важно знать почему вы решили учить язык. Постараемся определить где и как вы можете его практиковать.

Можем выучить несколько слов или фраз по методу, о котором я рассказал во вступительном видео. Надеюсь, вы тоже меня научите нескольким выражениям на вашем родном языке. А может быть, вы даже расскажете о своей стране и культуре. Если на первом занятии это не получится, ничего страшного. 

Поставим достижимые цели, которые помогут не падать духом. Ведь бывает, кажется, что топчешься на месте. Но, курочка, как говорится, по зёрнышку клюёт. Или, возможно, вам ближе такое выражение на турецком: «Damlaya damlaya göl olur». Это выражение переводится примерно так: «Капля по капле — будет озеро». Получается, лучше заниматься каждый день, пусть даже понемногу. Так что постараемся понять как вы можете накапливать такие капельки или зёрнышки регулярно.

На занятиях же, можем учиться читать, правильно произносить слова. Всё зависит от вашего уровня знания языка. Ну и я вам что-нибудь расскажу или почитаю. Так вы поймёте, как же всё-таки использовать новые слова и выражения. А иначе, они просто забудутся. 

Готовы начать? До встречи на уроке!

pro_course_detail.title: Türkçeyi seviyorum!
pro_course_detail.description: Живу в Турции, поэтому, говорю на турецком каждый день. Исключения бывают редко) Учебники я не очень люблю, но они есть в наличии:) Аудиоматериалы к учебному материалу мне нравятся больше.

pro_course_detail.title: Видео, музыка, картинки — выбирайте то, что вам больше нравится. Если цена за урок слишком высока для вас, попросите скидку, я не против) Возможен заказ урока вне моего графика.
pro_course_detail.description:
Расскажите, пожалуйста, для чего учите язык и где хотите его использовать. Я подберу материалы. Например, выберу отрывок из мультика или фильма, придумаю вопросы, и на уроке мы обсудим их. Также вы сами заранее можете записать вопросы — так будет ещё интереснее и полезнее.

Если же вы больше предпочитаете музыку или картинки, будем использовать тот же подход, что и с видео. Выберите, пожалуйста, то, что больше нравится. Готов выслушать ваши пожелания по поводу проведения урока. Можем добавить чтение текста.

Не нашли время в моём расписании? Готов подстроиться. Напишите, пожалуйста, когда вы хотите заказать урок. Постараюсь найти оптимальный вариант.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! I am Elena and I am a certified teacher of Russian as a foreign language with a master's degree in History of Art from Moscow State University. Moscow is my mother city, and I also work as a tour guide here. I have been teaching since 2013, both Russian students and foreign learners. I used to live and work in Saint Petersburg, and this experience (together with the lockdown) has opened for me a path to online teaching. Now I am happy to share with you my professional skills, my love for Russian culture, and my communication energy.
teacher_info.short_signature: TORFL. Certificated Russian as a Foreign Language Teacher with Art History Master's degree from MSU.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I teach all needed blocks of Russian: speaking, reading, writing, and listening.
If you are going to study or work in Russia, I will help you at all stages of preparation for the TORFL exam. My lessons are practical and may include essay writing, tests, watching and discussing videos, and reading texts.
I work with beginners, intermediate and advanced learners.
Within our common work, you can achieve good and accurate knowledge in Russian including pronunciation, contemporary slang, and details of grammar. 
I may give you homework. Its amount depends on your wish and the time you are ready to devote to Russian. But remember, regularity brings more results than occasional intensity.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my lessons you will get:
1) study plan with clear goals and timings
2) grammar system
3) TORFL exam preparation
4) business Russian language
5) safe and ecological communication
6) quality immersion in Russian history and culture
7) mood boost

I'm a cheerful, empathic, and inquisitive person who likes to travel and communicate. I am open to any topic.

cert_info.description: In order to qualify to teach professionally, I applied to the Russian Language Centre at Moscow State University. Here I took a course "Methods of Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language" of 350 academic hours, passed 9 exams in disciplines. This diploma is a document of established form and gives the right to conduct a new type of professional activity. I can attach only one file here - a photograph of the diploma. I am ready to send all the attachments to the diploma on request.

At the introductory lesson we will talk about your way of learning Russian, and take into account all the wishes and requirements. I'll tell you what materials we'll use, teach you the very first phrases (or not first), and share apps and sites to help you learn Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Grammar Aspects
pro_course_detail.description:
Russian grammar is not complicated if you understand it within the system. I have developed useful tables and materials that, together with my grammar course, will help you UNDERSTAND the grammatical system of the Russian language. No cramming, just eureka!
Please note that сhecking homework is included during class.

pro_course_detail.title: Complete Russian language course
pro_course_detail.description:
A full course of Russian that includes all types of speech - speaking, reading, listening, and writing. I will provide all materials: textbooks, authentic materials, exercises and useful grammar tables. If you want to speak from the first lessons, understand the grammatical system of the Russian language, and register your progress regularly, this course will help you. Please note that сhecking homework is included during class. 

My course is extremely individual: we will take into account your interests, profession, age, purpose, speed of learning, mood and frequency of lessons. 

I teach Russian in real-life situations applicable to your life. I can also advise you on exams, documents, and living conditions in Russia. 

If you are in Moscow, offline lessons and tours adapted to your level are possible. For all the terms and conditions, please contact me in direct.

pro_course_detail.title: TORFL exam preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to study in Russia, work here or are you obtaining citizenship? Or maybe you just want to get proof of your Russian language skills? I can help you. My students pass the TORFL with an average of 90%. All levels.
Please note that сhecking homework is included during class.

course_info.trial_description:
Пробный урок - это отличная возможность познакомиться!
Для меня очень важно, чтобы ты, мой потенциальный будущий ученик, познакомился со мной, моим стилем работы, как я общаюсь и обучаю. 
В свою очередь, я буду рада познакомиться с тобой, чтобы наладить контакт в менее формальной обстановке, узнать твой уровень языка, поговорить о том, зачем ты изучаешь русский язык, чтобы в дальнейшем помогать тебе в достижении твоей цели.
Буду рада нашей встрече!

A trial lesson is a great opportunity to get to know each other!
It is very important for me that you, my potential future student, get to know me, my style of work, how I communicate and teach.
In turn, I will be glad to get to know you in order to establish contact in a less formal conditions, to find out your level of language, to talk about why you are studying Russian, in order to help you achieve your goals.
I will be glad to meet you!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика. Speaking practice.
pro_course_detail.description:
Разговорная практика - моя любимая категория уроков)
В процессе общения обещаю максимум комфорта и доброжелательности, минимум неловкости и непонимания. 
В зависимости от твоего уровня и целей изучения русского языка, мы будем обсуждать различные темы, расширять твой словарный запас.
Знаю много способов, как помочь тебе учит новые слова - выберем тот, который лучше всего тебе подходит.
Давай поговорим по-русски;)

Speaking practice is my favorite category of lessons)
In the process of communication, I promise maximum comfort and goodwill, minimum awkwardness and misunderstanding.
Depending on your level and goals of learning Russian, we will discuss various topics, expand your vocabulary.
I know many ways to help you learn new words - we will choose the one that suits you best.
Let's speak Russian;)

A lesson in which we will touch upon various aspects of the Russian language (phonetics, grammar, speech development, and so on).

pro_course_detail.title: Урок по грамматике. Grammar lesson
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот урок для тебя, если тебе нужно выучить определённую грамматическую тему, лучше понять или отработать на практике. Для объяснения я использую наглядную презентацию с теорией, иллюстрациями и упражнениями для отработки материала. По завершении урока или темы, я высылаю презентацию, чтобы ты мог/могла повторить материал в удобное время.


This lesson is for you if you need to learn a certain grammatical topic, better understand or practice it. For the explanation, I use a visual presentation with theory, illustrations and exercises to practice the material. At the end of the lesson or topic, I send a presentation so that you can review the material at a convenient time.

teacher_info.intro:
Thank you for visiting my profile page! My name is Maria and I am a TEFL-certified teacher of English. I also know some Italian and have a huge curiosity about other languages and the world in general. I have lived and worked in many regions of the U.S., Singapore, India, and Russia. 

To me, learning and teaching languages is a way to really get to know people AND to help others achieve their goals and start communicating with more of the world. I can't wait to meet you! Я с нетерпением жду нашей встречи, друзья!
teacher_info.about_me:

To me, learning and teaching languages is a way to really get to know people AND to help others achieve their goals and start communicating with more of the world. I can't wait to meet you! Я с нетерпением жду нашей встречи, друзья!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Given my extensive background in the corporate world, my specialty is Business English. However, I love conversation classes as well!

I aim to make our lessons interactive, fun, and focused on real-life language, not endless conjugations and worksheets. We will use articles, recent news, short videos, games, and stories. If you prefer studying using a specific book, focus only on conversation or get lots of homework, just let me know. You are the Boss!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching method is based on communication, hence, we will focus on conversation in each class but will definitely not ignore other skills. 

BUSINESS ENGLISH: I am here to help you improve your English for work, assist with writing your resume, even prepare for interviews. We will work together on composing business correspondence, preparing PowerPoint presentations, practicing for interviews and meetings. We will use business-related topics for discussion and review.

CONVERSATION (ENG/RUS): We won’t be filling out countless workbook exercises but working on speaking and understanding real-life English.

exp_info.description:
As most of my professional experience has been and continues to be inside the corporate world, I am confident that I can help my students advance their Business English skills. 
I have provided specialized advisory services on various assignments with clients in SE Asia, Japan, South Africa, and the U.S. across multiple industries. This experience would also help me connect on meaningful levels with people from different cultures. During my time with PwC, I also worked for 4 years in Singapore.

While contributing to my experience in the corporate world, this role also allows me to review complex reports prepared by the non-native speakers of English in our global offices. I often edit and offer suggestions on improvements to the language used, so we can deliver the message in a clear, concise manner. Throughout my career, I’ve enjoyed teaching and coaching; I’ve always loved offering guidance, suggesting possible improvements, encouraging hard work, and celebrating success together.

As an au pair, I tutored a 12-yo child in my host family in various subjects, including English and Russian. I helped her study for middle school and high school exams. This experience made me understand that everyone learns differently, that it is paramount to tailor teaching methods to the needs of a particular student. I also practiced creating educational materials appropriate for my student's age and level of knowledge in different subjects. Finally, I learnt that I really enjoyed teaching!

cert_info.description: I have completed 120-hour Primary Certification training as well as 60 hours of Foundations in Teaching English Online and 60 hours of Advanced Methods in Teaching English Online. As part of this program, I prepared lesson plans for adults and children of different language proficiency, demonstrated my knowledge of advanced grammar and various methods to help students acquire information, retain it, and use it to communicate appropriately. I also studied in detail how to teach Business English.

course_info.trial_description:
When you book a 30-minute trial lesson, here is what we will cover:

•	You and your reasons for learning English or Russian
•	Your prior experience with learning English or Russian
•	Your preferences for the lesson structure
•	Lesson materials and your plan

If you can, please message me before our trial or our first lesson and tell me a little about yourself and your language goals. That way I can prepare the best materials for you and our lessons. 

I look forward to hearing from you.
Have a beautiful day!

***Please note that it is not possible to reschedule or cancel the lesson within 24 hours. The full price of the lesson will be charged for missed lessons. It takes time to prepare for our classes and canceled class time cannot be booked by other students. Thank you for your understanding!***

pro_course_detail.title: BUSINESS ENGLISH
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you need help preparing for a job interview? I can help you with the following:
- Practicing interview questions, 
- Understanding the interview process,
- Using the appropriate tone during your interviews,
- Building/ editing your CV.

Additionally, you can count on me and my experience in:
- Preparing and perfecting your PowerPoint presentations, 
- Adapting content to purpose, context, and audience,
- Using the appropriate style and tone of writing for business purposes.

In our lessons, we will use business-related materials to acquire interesting vocabulary and discuss various work-related topics.

We will study specific business terms and idioms useful for networking and business meetings, composing business correspondence, and communicating effectively over the phone and during web conferences.  

*I will give you homework after each session and we will discuss your completed assignments in detail in the following class.

***CANCELLATIONS Please note that it is not possible to reschedule or cancel the lesson within 24 hours. The full price of the lesson will be charged for missed lessons. It takes time to prepare for our classes and canceled class time cannot be booked by other students. Thank you for your understanding!***

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice - ENGLISH
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons aim to help you gain speaking and listening fluency. I will assist you in finding the material to use in your language study outside of our lessons. We will then discuss the material, address your questions, and go over my feedback for your word usage, sentence structure, and pronunciation. 

Book these lessons if you would like to: 
•	expand your knowledge of the language, 
•	improve your pronunciation, 
•	get used to colloquial speech, 
•	acquire new idioms and common sayings, 
•	identify difficult grammar points for further study, 
•	keep your language "alive" through conversation. 

I will correct any errors and will take note of any areas you are struggling with so we can revisit them in future lessons until they are no longer an issue for you.

***Please note that it is not possible to reschedule or cancel the lesson within 24 hours. The full price of the lesson will be charged for missed lessons. It takes time to prepare for our classes and canceled class time cannot be booked by other students. Thank you for your understanding!***

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Ibrahim. I am from Uzbekistan. I am a native Russian speaker, but also my native languages are Uzbek and Kyrgyz (Uzbekistan dialect). I grew up being surrounded by these 3 languages in my early years, every day switching between them depending on whether I was at home, outside, or at school. Later, I was exposed to other languages like English, Turkish, and Arabic, and I really liked them. Languages have become a big part of my life since then.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi! My name is Ibrahim. I am from Uzbekistan. I am a native Russian speaker, but also my native languages are Uzbek and Kyrgyz (Uzbekistan dialect). I grew up being surrounded by these 3 languages in my early years, every day switching between them depending on whether I was at home, outside, or at school. Later, I was exposed to other languages like English, Turkish, and Arabic, and I really liked them. Languages have become a big part of my life since then.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I would say I started teaching Russian and Uzbek to my university friends first. It was nothing more than a conversational Russian practice help, but with a few grammar explanations and new words and phrases. It happened to be very effective.
After university, I started taking teaching Russian more seriously. I put more emphasis on grammar and practicing speaking skills to make well-constructed lessons. But at the same time, I learned to build an individual approach to every student.
I worked in a summer language school in Russia for some time, where I taught English as a second language. In general, I have been working as a language tutor on different language levels for about 5 years now.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My classes are first of all to help YOU become more confident and fluent in the language you are learning. So depending on your goals and wishes, we will concentrate on aspects of the language that you want to improve: speaking, vocabulary, pronunciation, writing, and grammar. I provide lessons for students of all levels, including complete beginners (age 14+).
   
    Russian Language:
1. Conversational Russian (A1-C2)
2. Russian and its Grammar (A0-B2)
   
    Uzbek Language:
1. Conversational Uzbek (A1-C2)

    English
1. General English (A0-B2)

I want to thank you for your time.
I'll see you in class!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный Русский / Conversational Russian
Русский язык и Грамматика / Russian and Its Grammar (A0-B2)
pro_course_detail.description:
AGE 14+! (Unfortunately, I am not qualified to teach children, therefore, I cannot provide such type of lessons.)

Привет!
Если вы начинаете изучать русский язык с нуля или испытываете трудности с пониманием грамматики русского языка, то этот урок для вас! 
Изучение любого языка требует много времени, сил и, самое главное, мотивации. Но это не означает, что изучение языка - это страдания и муки. Наоборот - это счастье маленьких побед на всем протяжении изучения и открытие закрытых дверей в новый мир. И я хотел бы поделиться опытом и знаниями, чтобы ваш путь в мир русского языка был как можно больше приятным и эффективным.
В этом уроке мы больше внимания будем уделять освоению грамматики, развитию навыков чтения и письма, а также для закрепления материала будут даваться домашние задания. Можем структурированно пройтись по всей грамматике или же выборочно по конкретным аспектам где вы чувствуете вам нужно больше практики.
------------------------------------------------------------------
Hey there!
If you are starting to learn Russian from scratch or have difficulty understanding Russian grammar, then this lesson is for you!
Learning any language takes a lot of time, effort and, most importantly, motivation. But this does not mean that learning the language should be pure suffering and torment. On the contrary, it should consist of the happiness of small victories throughout the study and the opening of closed doors to a new world. And I would like to share my experience and knowledge so that your path to the world of the Russian language is as pleasant and effective as possible.
In this lesson, we will pay more attention to mastering grammar, developing reading and writing skills, and homework will be given to consolidate the material. We can go through the whole grammar in a structured way, or selectively on specific aspects where you feel you need more practice.

teacher_info.about_teacher: J'aime que mes cours soient dynamiques et qu'ils soient intéressant pour mes élèves c'est pourquoi je m'assure toujours de connaître leurs motivations, leurs niveau mais également leurs passions et leurs intérêts dans la vie, ainsi je peux leur préparer des cours sur mesure.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Je pense que pour apprendre une langue, il est important de prendre du plaisir dans l'apprentissage. Nous travaillerons avec différents support tels que des vidéos, des photos et des articles pour pratiquer le russe. Nous pourrons parler de sujets de la vie quotidienne, de vos passions, des différences culturelles et de tout autre sujet de votre choix dans le but de vous faire parler un maximum le russe. Nous pouvons aussi nous focaliser sur des points particuliers qui vous posent problèmes  (règles de grammaire,conjugaison...)

course_info.trial_description: Cette leçon vous permettra de savoir si nous serons en mesure de travailler ensemble, de discuter des objectifs, des besoins spéciaux et des problèmes dans le processus d'apprentissage de la langue russe. De plus, au cours de cette leçon, je pourrai évaluer votre niveau afin d'adapter mon cours.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation A1-C2
pro_course_detail.description: Apprendre le russe en parlant de sujets qui vous intéressent est plus facile et vous donnera envie de persévérer. J'utilise l'actualité et vos centres d'intérêt pour alimenter nos futurs sujets de conversation. Je m'adapte a vos besoins et on se concentra sur ce qui compte les plus pour vos objectifs.

pro_course_detail.title: Russe pour les débutants
pro_course_detail.description: Ici nous commençons du niveau le plus basique qui vous permettre de communiquer à l'écrit et à l'oral dans des situations simples de la vie quotidienne, de lire et d'écrire des textes simples.

pro_course_detail.title: Cours de russe intermédiaire et avancé
pro_course_detail.description: L'objectif principal de mes cours de russe est d'aider l'élève à comprendre les points principaux d'une conversation courante, de parler de livres, raconter le sujets d'un films, exprimer ses impressions, sentiments et de se perfectionner en grammaire et en conjugaison.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I teach Russian, which is my mother tongue, and I can also help you practicing your Italian which I speak on a native speakers' level.
I took several courses at the most advanced Russian institutions, which allowed me to bring my teaching skills to the next level. You can see all my certificates below.
To get to know me better, you might also want to take a look at my Instagram profile @RUSSIAN.LANGUAGE.COACH
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I use the communicative approach as my teaching method. It's about consolidating every grammar aspect by using it in your speech so you get used to speaking correctly as soon as possible. I encourage my students to speak a lot during our lessons, gradually overcoming the language barrier. Having a teacher by your side helps you relax and lower your stress level when you get to use the language outside the classroom!
I love explaining Russian grammar: what seems absolutely deprived of logic will make sense! Let me know your needs and we'll find out the best solution according to your current level and needs. You don’t need to buy any textbooks, I provide you with all needed materials.

edu_info.description:
English and Italian as languages of specialization.
Graduated with honours (110 e lode).

cert_info.description: Language Testing: Procedure and methodology Elementary, Basic Levels, TORFL-I, TORFL-II (assessment), Testing for citizenship, Integral exam of Russian Language, history of Russia, basic knowledge of Russian law

Stanislav Chernyshov is the famous author of the textbook "Poehali". I took his course for Russian as foreign language teachers in spring 21. Thanks to this course I discovered new techniques and methods of teaching Russian and learned how to explain difficult things in an easy and funny way. Having studied from the author of the textbook I use at my lessons makes them even more useful for my students.

This course has given me a basic understanding of experimental linguistics and one of its thriving parts, studying brain activity, which provides language procedures. It has also introduced me into the basics of experimental studies of language and speech in children and adults, the basic principles and objectives of psycholinguistics, case studies, methodology and scientific paradigms.
cert_info.institution: Saint Petersburg State University and Coursera

course_info.trial_description: Don't hesitate to book a trial lesson with me to see how my lessons are or simply to get to know me better!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a lesson for those who already have a basic knowledge of Russian and wish to improve their speaking skills.

Questa è una lezione per chi ha già un livello base di russo e vorrebbe praticare la conversazione. 

Это занятие для тех, у кого уже есть базовый уровень русского языка и кто хотел бы развивать свой разговорный русский.

pro_course_detail.title: Italian conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a lesson for those who already have a basic knowledge of Italian and wish to improve their speaking skills. 

Это занятие для тех, у кого уже есть базовый уровень итальянского языка и кто хотел бы развивать свой разговорный итальянский.

Questa è una lezione per chi ha già un livello base di italiano e vorrebbe praticare la conversazione.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian grammar
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a lesson either for beginners or for those who've been learning Russian for a while but still struggle with the grammar. Be it verbal aspects or cases - I can help the student get a clear understanding of how it works! The lesson will be customized to the needs of every student and include a series of exercises to boost their grammar skills. I mainly use my own materials, as well as the textbook Poehali (new version). 

Questa lezione è sia per chi deve iniziare da zero che per chi ha già un buon livello di russo ma è indietro con la grammatica. Che siano gli aspetti verbali o i casi – so aiutare lo studente a capire come funzioni! La lezione sarà adatta alle esigenze specifiche di ogni studente e includerà degli esercizi volti a migliorare la grammatica. Utilizzo principalmente i materiali scritti da me ma anche una serie di esercizi tratti da altre fonti.

I'm from Belarus (this is a country near Russia, and we all speak Russian, this is our official language and we have good relationships with Russia) and I was born and raised in Minsk. I study in high school now and this year I will apply to the university. I like watching YT videos and Netflix or Apple TV movies. Also, I love traveling and experiencing new things.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I have 2 years of Russian language teaching experience and I did my student teaching at Belarussian middle school and on two international online platforms. I always try to give my students to talk as much as possible.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my lessons, each student will have a fun and understandable topic. In the lessons, we will learn new words, grammar rules, perform tests, etc. The program changes depending on the level of your Russian language. The language level is determined in the introductory lesson.

course_info.trial_description:
At a test lesson I will check your Russian level, and start the topics suitable for your level. Thanks to this lesson you can see the teaching methodology of the language, and enroll in the following classes.

Let's chat in Russian!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's speak in Russian about topics that interest you!
In this class, you will be able to practice your conversational skills, learn new words and phrases in Russian. 

Don't be afraid of making mistakes!
There will be NO interruption during conversation and corrections if any will be at the end of the class. 

Let's chat in Russian!

teacher_info.intro:
Hi everyone! My name is Eugeniya, I was born and raised in Moscow, Russia. My mother tongue is Russian and I would love to help you improve your Russian.  
My interests are: photography, travelling, data visualisation, psychology. I also love meeting people from all over the world as I am very interested in different cultures, I guess here my passion for language learning was born :))
teacher_info.about_me:

My interests are: photography, travelling, data visualisation, psychology. I also love meeting people from all over the world as I am very interested in different cultures, I guess here my passion for language learning was born :))
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a native Russian speaker and I've been teaching for 3 years already. I decided to start teaching as am really enjoying the process of helping others with languages and I am very open and interested in learning more about other cultures 🙂
teacher_info.teaching_style: I usually prepare classes in a way that best suits your needs. Mostly during our lessons we will be focusing on speaking. So if you already know some basics (A2 and more) and would like to practice your speaking skills - you are in a right place! With pleasure I will help you feel confidence while speaking and boost your vocabulary.

course_info.trial_description: You can send me your goals or discuss any details prior to the class so that I will customise this class to suit you :)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian (Разговорный русский)
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is suitable for those who already know the basics of Russian and want to improve speaking skills. Therefore, if you
- have been studying Russian for some time, know grammar basics but have language barrier 
- want to maintain your level enjoying conversations with a native speaker :)
- just want to start talking ASAP

this is the right class for you! 

We can choose topics in advance or improvise during the class.

See you :)

pro_course_detail.title: Writing skills boosting and proofreading
pro_course_detail.description:
During this class we will be focusing on practicing your writing skills. I can help you to correct errors of grammar, spelling, punctuation, sentence structure. Together we'll boost your writing :)

P.S. if you like to write we can also practice some creative writing techniques :) The curriculum is flexible so make sure to let me know what your goal is in advance.

See you :)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for IT Specialists
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is for you if you need to practice your IT vocabulary :) you are going to have a job interview in russian or you just like to talk about IT and whant to add some new words from the digital world.

We can read IT oriented articles and discuss them or we can have a role-play interview during the lesson. Tell me what your goals are and I will customize our lessons to better suit your needs. 

See you :)

teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone!  My name is Mikhail, I was born and raised in Russia, but now I live in Bulgaria.  I am 34 years old, I graduated from Perm State University as a teacher of chemistry.  I love traveling, meeting different people, playing sports and learning foreign languages.  I am very calm and patient, my mother is a teacher of Russian language and literature, so she instilled a love for Russian literature and language since childhood.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi everyone!  My name is Mikhail, I was born and raised in Russia, but now I live in Bulgaria.  I am 34 years old, I graduated from Perm State University as a teacher of chemistry.  I love traveling, meeting different people, playing sports and learning foreign languages.  I am very calm and patient, my mother is a teacher of Russian language and literature, so she instilled a love for Russian literature and language since childhood.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
На своих уроках я поделюсь с вами лексическими и грамматическими структурами которые русские используют в повседневной жизни. Я постараюсь максимально мягко ввести вас в разговорный процесс и постараюсь в корчащий срок помочь вам преодолеть языковой барьер.
In my lessons, I will share with you the lexical and grammatical structures that Russians use in everyday life.  I will try to gently introduce you into the conversational process and try to help you overcome the language barrier in a short time.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my lessons, we will try to build simple sentences and gradually complicate the constructions, which will allow you to start speaking Russian from the very first lesson.  This is a very natural and simple way, like learning a language by children when parents gradually give them words and gently introduce them into the language environment.  Believe me, this is very simple and effective, I do not give any homework, I do not ask you to write down anything and consciously remember.

course_info.trial_description:
В этом уроке мы сможем познакомиться поближе, определить ваш уровень языка, а так же понять ваши цели и задачи в изучения русского языка. Мы совместно сможем построить четкий план наших будущиз занятий с учетом всех ваших предподвтений.
In this lesson, we will be able to get to know each other better, determine your level of the language, as well as understand your goals and objectives in learning the Russian language. Together we will be able to build a clear plan for our future classes, taking into account all your preferences.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот тип урока предполагает свободное общение на любые темы по вашему желанию. Мы будем разбираться в словах, конструкциях и улучшать произношение слов. Если у вас есть отдельные пожелания буду рад помочь вам. 
This type of lesson involves free communication on any topic you wish. We will understand words, constructions and improve the pronunciation of words. If you have specific requests I will be happy to help you.

teacher_info.intro: Hi, friend! I'm Gale and I live in Saint Petersburg. I'm a native Russian speaker and I also speak English. I'm a CELTA-certified teacher (Cambridge). I've been learning English for more than 20 years and teaching it for 10 years and really love it! In my leisure time, I like walking my dog, playing the violin, writing short stories, reading books, and watching movies.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified CELTA teacher with 10 years of teaching experience

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I really enjoy meeting new people and help them to learn a new language. The main thing in learning is speaking practice so that you can do it confidently!
Привет, меня зовут Галя, и я преподаватель английскго языка. Несколько слов обо мне: я изучаю английский с детства, а последние 10 лет - преподаю. Обучалась в российском университете на учителя, а год назад закончила курс от Кембриджа - CELTA. Это интенсивная программа, которая многое дала мне. Благодаря своему опыту я понимаю, какие трудности возникают у изучающих язык. Наверное, самый большой страх - разговаривать на другом языке. Поэтому на уроках я стараюсь использовать только английский.
teacher_info.teaching_style: According to the aims of a student, I use different materials: books, videos, audios. Sometimes we just talk. I always try to listen to a person and consider their feelings and needs.

edu_info.description: Преподаватель английского и немецкого языков с правом перевода
Cambridge English Level 5 Certificate in Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages

teacher_info.about_teacher: I always try to find the right approach to the student and create a lively and friendly atmosphere at my lessons with free conversation and discussions. I never put pressure on the student and always let him/her finish the sentence and only after that I try to explain the mistakes made by the student. In my opinion, the most important thing is to convey the idea that a student's mistake is not a problem, but progress. Mistakes make us stronger 💪
teacher_info.teaching_style: Most of the lessons will be devoted to conversation. We can also watch music videos, TV chronicles and archives, read articles, discuss books. But I am also always open to suggestions for material for lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Speaking Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson is for those of you who are looking for conversation/speaking practice. In the lessons we will be working on your conversational skills through various activities: 
1) discussion on specific topics
2) spontaneous chat 
3) storytelling
4) role-play (e.g job interview, telephoning, shopping, at a hotel/restaurant/doctor's, etc.)
